Entries.Introduction: As long as you stay on my good side, we'll totally be BFFs!$0
Entries.spring_1: Spring is when my birthday is, so it's pretty much the best season.$0
Entries.spring_2: %Kandi is singing one of her songs.
Entries.spring_3: Hiro is sooo cute.$0#$b#He probably thinks I'm cute too, of course~.$1
Entries.spring_4: If I weren't an axolotl, I think I would be a unicorn.$0#$b#It just makes sense, you know?$0
Entries.spring_5: Some people say I look like a doll.$0#$b#I just respond with 'I know~'.$0
Entries.spring_6: It's the best day ever...my birthday!$1
Entries.spring_7: %Kandi is singing one of her songs.
Entries.spring_8: I never go to the lake area.$3#$b#It's just, like, so dirty and messy.$3
Entries.spring_9: You must be honored to know a famous idol such as myself~.$0
Entries.spring_10: Make sure to buy my merch!$0
Entries.spring_11: Everyone says Puka is such a good singer.$3#$b#There's no way he's better than me, though!$0
Entries.spring_12: Maybe I should just play games all day long.$3
Entries.spring_13: %Kandi is singing one of her songs.
Entries.spring_14: I think I'm just gonna eat candy today.$3#$b#It's one of those days.$3
